akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 103–382, title III, § 391(w), Oct. 20, 1994, 108 Stat. 4025

akn:content.akn:p:
§§ 9861, 9862. Repealed. Pub. L. 103–382, title III, § 391(w), Oct. 20, 1994, 108 Stat. 4025
Section 9861, Pub. L. 97–35, title VI, § 662, Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 508; Pub. L. 101–501, title II, § 202, Nov. 3, 1990, 104 Stat. 1243, authorized financial assistance for Follow Through programs.
Section 9862, Pub. L. 97–35, title VI, § 663, as added Pub. L. 101–501, title II, § 203, Nov. 3, 1990, 104 Stat. 1244; amended Pub. L. 102–119, § 26(c), Oct. 7, 1991, 105 Stat. 607, related to consideration of applications.
A prior section 9862, Pub. L. 97–35, title VI, § 663, Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 509; Pub. L. 98–558, title III, § 301, Oct. 30, 1984, 98 Stat. 2887; Pub. L. 99–425, title II, § 201(a), Sept. 30, 1986, 100 Stat. 966, related to funding requirements, prior to repeal by Pub. L. 101–501, title II, § 203, Nov. 3, 1990, 104 Stat. 1244.
